Elder Balanki:
Ah, Mion... So rich, but always late with guild payments. This is not the first time this has happened. He ignores his obligations on purpose. He must be taught a lesson! I see you have received Maryse Redbonnet's dues. I thought he was so blinded by revenge that he couldn't see anything else. At least he knows how to pay.
Many thanks for your troubles! Here is the receipt. Take this to the First Elder.
